main event: Two observers reported an object with two smaller objects attached that streaked away, observed in New York City.
interesting points: Reports originated from several witnesses in the Brooklyn Navy Yard area who observed strange lights,The sightings occurred during evening hours, between 7:00 P.M. and 10:00 P.M.,Witnesses described the lights as bright, maneuvering rapidly and making sudden directional changes,Sounds associated with the lights included a humming noise,The object described had a circular shape and a dull silver or gray metallic appearance.
sighted object: an unidentified object with two smaller objects attached
location: New York City, New York, USA
witness description: two boys reported the sighting to their mother
